title: Borisovo, Altai Krai
text:
Borisovo () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">selo</a>) and the administrative center of Borisovsky Selsoviet, <a href="Zalesovsky%20District">Zalesovsky District</a>, <a href="Altai%20Krai">Altai Krai</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>. The population was 699 as of 2013. There are 10 streets.
Geography.
Borisovo is located 20 km southwest of <a href="Zalesovo%2C%20Altai%20Krai">Zalesovo</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Nikolsky is the nearest rural locality.
